Title: India’s IOC seeks second-half May LNG delivery to Dahej
Description: India’s state-owned IndianOil (IOC) has issued a tender to buy one LNG cargo for delivery on May 20, with the discharge volume to be split equally between the Petronet-operated 17.5 mtpa Dahej LNG receiving terminal in Gujarat and the 5 mtpa Ennore LNG import terminal in Chennai. The tender closes tomorrow.
Author: CK
